name: Halloween Shooter: Trick or Treat? help us clear the ghost and spirit around us - The best of halloween crazy elimination puzzle games
name_original: Halloween Shooter: Trick or Treat? help us clear the ghost and spirit around us - The best of halloween crazy elimination puzzle games
description:
Trick or Treat? help us clear the ghost and spirit around us
The best of halloween crazy elimination puzzle games
-------------------------------------------
The new Halloween game from the makers of hit app, Halloween Shooter!
The super hit game Halloween Shooter is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
-------------------------------------------
● TASTY GRAPHICS that will leave you hungry for more
● EASY AND FUN to play, but a interesting to fully master
● LEADER BOARDS for you and your friends
● TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated Coloring, effects!
--------------------------------------------
Please note: Halloween Shooter is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Halloween Shooter!
